org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization

Interface Deserializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type it can deserialize.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Serdes<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonBooleanSerdes, JsonNumberSerdes, JsonObjectSerdes, JsonSerdes, JsonStringSerdes, JsonValueSerdes, OverlaySerdes, TextDeserializer, VoidSerdes

    public interface Deserializer<T>
    Performs deserialization of Types.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] accept()
      Informs the content type this serializer handle.
      T deserialize(String response, DeserializationContext context)
      Deserialize the plain text into an object of type T.

      Class<T> handledType()
      Method for accessing type of Objects this deserializer can handle.

    • Method Detail

      • handledType

        Class<T> handledType()
        Method for accessing type of Objects this deserializer can handle.
        Returns:
        The class which this deserializer can deserialize

      • accept

        String[] accept()
        Informs the content type this serializer handle.
        Returns:
        The content type handled by this serializer.

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(String response,
            DeserializationContext context)
        Deserialize the plain text into an object of type T.
        Parameters:
        response - Http response body content
        context - Context of deserialization
        Returns:
        The object deserialized

                                                  DeserializationContext context)
        Deserialize the plain text into an object of type T.
